description.p: The Staff of the Magi is a long, ebony and gold staff, engraved with shifting arcane runes that glow with ethereal light. It hums softly with raw magical power, and ancient legends claim it was forged in the Astral Plane by an archmage of immense power.
The staff allows the wielder to cast the following spells without expending spell slots (up to the caster's maximum spellcasting level):
When a spell targets only you, you can absorb it and negate its effects. The absorbed spellâ€™s level is converted into charges for the staff (up to 50 charges stored).
As an action, you can break the staff, releasing a devastating explosion.
Every creature within 30 feet takes spell damage equal to five times the number of charges left in the staff (Dexterity save DC 17 for half).
The wielder has a 50% chance of teleporting to another plane or is reduced to dust if they fail.
description.h4: +2 to Spell Attacks and Save DCs (Passive Bonus)
description.p: While holding the staff, you gain +2 to spell attack rolls and spell save DCs.
You have advantage on saving throws against spells and magical effects.

set.name: attunement
set.addition: by a sorcerer, wizard or warlock
